class="text_word">There </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">comes </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">an </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#889098">hour </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">when </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#84643c">begging </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#90688c">stops, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#64b8ff">long </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5868ff">interceding </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bcc0ff">lips </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#90688c">Perceive </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">their </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#64b8ff">prayer </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#90688c">vain. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bcc0ff">"Thou </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bcc0ff">shalt </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">not" </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#64b8ff">kinder </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ff08b4">sword </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Than </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">from </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9cccff">disappointing </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bc7488">God </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#9cccff">"Disciple, </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#90688c">call </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">again." </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
